description.displayText: We interviewed Emily and thought she was very warm and caring. She seemed to be loving and the kids liked her immediately. We were not able to hire her but would use her for date nights.
description.originalText: We interviewed Emily and thought she was very warm and caring. She seemed to be loving and the kids liked her immediately. We were not able to hire her but would use her for date nights.

description.displayText: Sweet caregiver with long experience with children. Emily puts 110% into the children entrusted in her care, evidenced by the fact that she has a CPR app on her phone and regularly reviews CPR procedures "just in case" a child in her care needs help! Emily is a sweet, gentle soul who, as another reviewer stated, doesn't look at this as just a job- it is her passion.

description.displayText: Emily worked for us this past April when our normal care-giver (my mom) was unavailable. My daughter is 5 months old, and I felt comfortable with Emily watching her from the very beginning. Emily has a lot of experience with babies (and I know other ages as well), and she was great with our daughter. She is patient, loving, genuinely loves kids, and was able to keep our daughter on a good schedule.  She has a warm and happy personality that makes her great with kids. Our daughter enjoyed her time with Emily and I felt good leaving her in Emily's hands. In addition, because my baby slept for a good part of the day, Emily helped us with light housekeeping- dishes and laundry mainly. A big help! We'd hire Emily again and likely will the next time the need arises.

description.displayText:
Emily was my full time nanny for 13 years.   She started when my son was 3 years old.  We adore her!   I never worried when my son was with her, I knew he was safe and well cared for, according to my instructions.   She also helped on occasional evenings,  weekends, and overnight.  She is an excellent driver, and always has a safe, reliable car.   She never missed a day of work, and she was always on time, as scheduled.   We provided a car for my son's transportation.   Emily drove my son everyday to school, after school sports and other activities, parks, library and bookstore,  movies and circus performances, as well as field trips to the Zoo,  Botanical Garden, museum,  Nature Center,  Art Museum.   On several occasions, she drove him to out of state locations for camps and sports events. 
Emily taught my son how to swim, ride a bike and rollerblade.  Under her loving care, he enjoyed various outdoor activities, as well as educational activities, reading, puzzles, playing games, music and dance, arts and crafts, and homework help.  While my son was in school, Emily helped with errands, grocery shopping, laundry and cooking.  She has boundless energy and enthusiasm, and a generous spirit.  This is not just a job for her, she is genuinely passionate about what she does.   Emily worked out great for our family's needs and I strongly recommend her.

description.displayText: Emily was with our family temporarily and we knew her for a short time while grandma was traveling. She's a wonderful person, very kind and nurturing to our baby boy (age 4 months at the time). She has a lot of experience but did not mind feedback and special parent instructions at all. Would definitely hire her again if needed.
